subtitle: Step-by-step guide for companies, no technical knowledge required

steps.title: 1. What is the WhatsApp Business API
steps.text: The WhatsApp Business API is the official WhatsApp solution designed for companies that need to integrate WhatsApp with systems, platforms, or automated services. It is not a mobile application and cannot be used like WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business App.

steps.title: 2. What you need before starting
steps.text: Your company must be legally registered, have a valid business email address, and own a phone number that has never been used with WhatsApp. This number must be dedicated exclusively to the WhatsApp Business API.

steps.title: 3. Access or create a Meta Business Manager account
steps.text: Go to business.facebook.com and create a Meta Business Manager account or use an existing one. This account will be used to manage your company assets, including WhatsApp.

steps.title: 4. Business verification
steps.text: Meta requires business verification using official company documents. Without completing this step, access to the WhatsApp Business API may be restricted or blocked.

steps.title: 5. Create a Meta app and enable WhatsApp
steps.text: Access developers.facebook.com, create a Business-type app, and add the WhatsApp product. This step connects your company to the WhatsApp Business API.

steps.title: 6. Create and approve message templates
steps.text: Message templates are mandatory to initiate conversations with customers. All templates must be submitted to Meta and approved before they can be used.

steps.title: 7. Deliver technical information to the integrator
steps.text: After configuration, you must provide the developer or integration partner with the Access Token, Phone Number ID, WhatsApp Business Account ID, and the list of approved templates.

items.q: Can I use my personal WhatsApp number?
items.a: No. The phone number must be completely free and not associated with any WhatsApp account.

items.q: Does the WhatsApp Business API have costs?
items.a: Yes. Meta charges per conversation, depending on the type of interaction.
Only within the 24-hour customer service window. Outside this window, approved templates must be used.

terms.title: Client Responsibility Terms
terms.text: The client is fully responsible for complying with Meta policies, obtaining user consent for communications, managing message content, and ensuring proper use of the WhatsApp Business API.
